name: Black Diamond Creek Chalk Bag
description: A heavy-duty bag for desperate offwidth grovelling and wide chimney thrutching. Yes!Heavy-duty, TPU coated, waterproof 1200-denier polyester.Ergonomic shape minimizes the need to dig deep into the chalk bag during a protracted crux.Waistbelt has metal closure.Includes zippered bottom pouch for your headlamp or snack.
